login_id.title: Login ID
login_id.description: The ID associated with the user who owns this API key. If you can login to multiple accounts, this ID will be the same for each account.

first_name.title: First Name
first_name.description: The first name tied to the account.

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: The last name tied to the account.

username.title: User Name
username.description: The username tied to the account.

avatar_url.title: Avatar URL
avatar_url.description: URL of the avatar for the user.

member_since.title: Account Creation Date
member_since.description: The date and time that the account was created in ISO 8601 format.

pricing_plan_type.title: Account Pricing Plan
pricing_plan_type.description: The type of pricing plan the account is on.

first_payment.title: First Payment
first_payment.description: Date of first payment for monthly plans.

account_timezone.title: Account Timezone
account_timezone.description: The timezone currently set for the account.

account_industry.title: Account Industry
account_industry.description: The user-specified industry associated with the account.

company.title: Company
company.description: The company name for the account.

addr1.title: Address Line 1
addr1.description: The street address for the account contact.

addr2.title: Address Line 2
addr2.description: The street address for the account contact.

city.title: City
city.description: The city for the account contact.

state.title: State
state.description: The state for the account contact.

zip.title: Zip Code
zip.description: The zip code for the account contact.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country for the account contact.

last_login.title: Last Login Date
last_login.description: The date and time of the last login for this account in ISO 8601 format.

total_subscribers.title: Total Subscribers
total_subscribers.description: The total number of subscribers across all lists in the account.

industry_stats.title: Industry Stats
industry_stats.description: The [average campaign statistics](https://mailchimp.com/resources/research/email-marketing-benchmarks/?utm_source=mc-api&utm_medium=docs&utm_campaign=apidocs) for all campaigns in the account's specified industry.

open_rate.title: Open Rate
open_rate.description: The average unique open rate for all campaigns in the account's specified industry.

bounce_rate.title: Bounce Rate
bounce_rate.description: The average bounce rate for all campaigns in the account's specified industry.

click_rate.title: Click Rate
click_rate.description: The average unique click rate for all campaigns in the account's specified industry.

_links.title: Links
_links.description: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.

items.title: Resource Link
items.description: This object represents a link from the resource where it is found to another resource or action that may be performed.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: As with an HTML 'rel' attribute, this describes the type of link.

href.title: Href
href.description: This property contains a fully-qualified URL that can be called to retrieve the linked resource or perform the linked action.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method that should be used when accessing the URL defined in 'href'.

targetSchema.title: Target Schema
targetSchema.description: For GETs, this is a URL representing the schema that the response should conform to.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: For HTTP methods that can receive bodies (POST and PUT), this is a URL representing the schema that the body should conform to.
